marklogic.body: cocaine dark skinned bru ... light skin bru... coca eenay... im freezain... couple gram powder play.... killa rail get lit Off... inhale a rail ya feel gone, clench teeth got feel on , battle tech got real on, lit a style get damage done, fake bass trap niggas get cook well d, mind swoll pockets cheap, tryin ta stay amazin b, no money pure work game plan look hazy b profit curves stay stayin b mad buck stay real gone, if beef buck shine strong... ima real human no FUSSS AND NO PLAY, ima real humanÂ go had evrery day.. sets weak light speak niggas tryin ta stay iron, every time i hear their shit i feel that they lyin... Cold cuts chill keep, store dope in the freezer, corner stay cool ause he keep a breezer
